content: Decentralised agencyAgency for Support for BEREC (BEREC Office)The agency helps to maintain a consistent application of regulations for electronic communications across the EU.Websitehttps://www.berec.europa.eu/enEmailberec@berec.europa.euPhone number+371 2957 8999AddressZ.A. Meierovica Bulvaris 14 Riga ,LV-1050 Latvia Decentralised agencyAgency for the Cooperation of Energy Regulators (ACER)The European Union Agency for the Cooperation of Energy Regulators works for a more competitive, efficient and secure energy market.Websitehttps://www.acer.europa.eu/Emailinfo@acer.europa.euPhone number+386 8 205 34 00Address Trg republike 3 1000 Ljubljana Slovenia European Union corporate bodyAuthority for European Political Parties and European Political Foundations (APPF)The Authority for European Political Parties and European Political Foundations is responsible for registering, controlling and imposing sanctions, when required, on European political parties and European political
